<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Riding Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3058)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 201 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +5; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=69), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 22

</row>

**[Buck](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=54)** <actions string="Reaction" /> DC 16

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +7,
**Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The riding horse Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

</column>

name: Riding Horse
